Introduction

Hello, you are looking at documentation for Chatflix – HTML Bootstrap 5 Chat Template. You will learn how to setup workspace, build and customize theme.

Since this theme is based on Bootstrap, you should check the official framework documentation before continuing. These pages will focus on the new and extended Bootstrap components.

Node.js

To be able to use the Gulp you need to download and install Node.js from the official site. The suggested version to install is 14.17.x LTS.

Gulpfile.js

Install Gulp Command Line Interface globally to use gulp in your terminal.

npm install gulp-cli -g

NPM modules

When you’re done, make sure you’ve installed the rest of the themes dependencies:

npm install

Gulp

Now, modify your SCSS and HTML source files and run npm run dev command in terminal for development or npm run build to build final production version of template. Use gulp --development and gulp --production for the same purposes. The BrowserSync plugin will open default browser and show result of editing. When you are done just hit Ctrl + C or close terminal to stop BrowserSync server. If nessesary use gulp clean to clean up assets folder, please note, you must not remove html files from dist folder, because these files are also source code.

npm run dev

npm run build

gulp --development

gulp --production

gulp clean

SCSS customizing

To ensure correct future updates you can edit three files:

  • custom-variables-light.scss or custom-variables-dark.scss: these files can be used to override Bootstrap and the template variables.
  • custom.scss: this file can be used for writing custom SCSS.

Support

To get help for this template please email to: realthemeshelp(at)gmail.com
